rules.en:
Here is information about Arbin's MITS Pro software:

**Overview:**
MITS Pro is Arbin Instrumentsâ€™ main control software for battery testing systems.

**Key Features:**
- Menu-based cycle programming
- Configurable stop conditions
- Intuitive graphical interface
- Compatible with multiple Arbin systems

**Applications:**
- R&D battery testing
- Quality control
- Data analysis and system monitoring

**Resources:**
- User manual: Documents/Software/MITS-Pro
- Technical support: support@arbin.com

rules.en:
Here is information about Arbinâ€™s **RBT Series**:

**Overview:**
The RBT (Research Battery Test) series provides advanced battery testing for R&D applications.

**Key Features:**
- High accuracy (Â±0.02% FS)
- Fast sampling rate (up to 100kHz)
- Integrated temperature control
- MITS Pro software compatibility

**Applications:**
- Advanced battery research
- Electrode material development
- Cycle life and performance testing

**Contact:**
applications@arbin.com | www.arbin.com/products/rbt-series
